lyrics:
"Bingo" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Bingo" (feat. Soulja Boy Tell 'Em, Waka Flocka Flame) [Intro:] It's Gucci! (It's Gucci!) Burr! Soulja Boy Tell Em'! It's Gucci! Flocka! Scott Storch, Gucci Mane, we back at it. Burr! So Icey. Yeeeaaahhh! [Chorus:] We smokin' that fire, endo wrist out the damn. Window Lambo - they scream 'Bingo'! Enzo - they scream 'Bingo'! Phantom - they scream 'Bingo'! Concept - they scream 'Bingo'! Pullup - kids scream 'Bingo'! Yo momma - scream 'Bingo'! Bingo! (Bingo!) [x8] Ahh... It's Gucci! [x6] Burr! Burr! [Verse: Gucci Mane] Yellow my watch, Yellow earrings 'n' my belt. Can't fit in my schedule, Less booty like jello. She know I slang kilos, Shout out to my 'migo, I call, he said 10-4, Tight like Lamont Rollo. My goal for El Gato, My house like a brothle, Fat hoes in Chicago, First class, tomorrow Morocco. Phantom with two moddles, Pull up tonight, strapped, Jump out, car scream 'pronto'! [Chorus:] We smokin' that fire, endo wrist out the damn. Window Lambo - they scream 'Bingo'! Enzo - they scream 'Bingo'! Phantom - they scream 'Bingo'! Concept - they scream 'Bingo'! Pullup - kids scream 'Bingo'! Yo momma - scream 'Bingo'! Bingo! (Bingo!) [x8] Ahh... It's Gucci! Soulja! It's Gucci! Soulja Boy Tell Em'! Burr! Burr! [Verse: Soulja Boy] I'm ridin' in my Lambo, Kids screamin 'Bingo'! Haters wanna hate, They'll get shot like a free throw. Candy paint wet (woosh), Drippin of my headlights, Catch me in the trap like some mothafuckin dead mice. Every time I cut a corner kids screamin 'Bingo'! (Bingo!) Tools on deck, I ain't talkin Home Depot! (Depot!) Soulja Boy Tell Em'! (Tell Em'!) I'm icey as a icicle, So much money, bitch, I valet park my bycicle! [Chorus:] We smokin' that fire, endo wrist out the damn. Window Lambo - they scream 'Bingo'! Enzo - they scream 'Bingo'! Phantom - they scream 'Bingo'! Concept - they scream 'Bingo'! Pullup - kids scream 'Bingo'! Yo momma - scream 'Bingo'! Bingo! (Bingo!) [x8] Ahh... It's Gucci! [x6] Burr! Flocka! Burr! Flocka! Flocka! [Verse: Waka Flocka Flame] All the hood hoes point like 'Bingo'! Waka Flocka "Oh Let's Dot It" is the single. Let's mingle, got hoes like Wingo, My bitch a 'dime', your bitch look like a 'cinco'! Like a free throw, man I'm ballin now! (Swish!) Blew a kiss to the girls, now they fallin out! I pull up in the t-top Cutlass like 'Bingo'! My girlfriend Regal, same color as a flamingo! [Chorus:] We smokin' that fire, endo wrist out the damn. Window Lambo - they scream 'Bingo'! Enzo - they scream 'Bingo'! Phantom - they scream 'Bingo'! Concept - they scream 'Bingo'! Pullup - kids scream 'Bingo'! Yo momma - scream 'Bingo'! Bingo! (Bingo!) [x8] Ahh... It's Gucci! [x6] Burr! Burr! Radric Davis" (2009) Classical (Intro) Interlude #1: Toilet Bowl Shawty Heavy Stupid Wild All About The Money Lemonade Bingo Spotlight I Think I'm In Love Bad Bad Bad Interlude #2: Toilet Bowl Shawty Sex In Crazy Places The Movie Volume Gingerbread Man Wasted Kush Is My Cologne Worst Enemy Interlude #3: Toilet Bowl Shawty Wasted (Remix) Search
title: Bingo Lyrics | AZLyrics.com
